title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 2070/92 of 30 June 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3493/90 laying down general rules for the grant of premiums to sheepmeat and goatmeat producers
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 2070/92 of 30 June 1992 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3493/90 laying down general rules for the grant of premiums to sheepmeat and goatmeat producers
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.

(1) shall apply to premiums paid in respect of the 1993 marketing year and thereafter.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 30 June 1992.
For the Council
The President
Arlindo MARQUES CUNHA
